H0.text: To which order of monks does or did Pope Francis belong. Benedictine

H1.text: To which order of monks does or did Pope Francis belong. Franciscan

H2.text: To which order of monks does or did Pope Francis belong. Dominican

H3.text: To which order of monks does or did Pope Francis belong. Jesuit

A4.text: In 2013, the Jesuit cardinal Jorge Bergoglio became Pope Francis.

A5.text: As a Jesuit pope, he has stressed discernment over following rules, changing the culture of the clergy to steer away from clericalism and to move toward an ethic of service.
